trans-unit.source: Defines values for specifying the parts of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" /> that are to be painted.
trans-unit.target: Define os valores para especificar as partes de um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" /> que serão pintadas.

trans-unit.source: This enumeration is used by the protected <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Paint%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method and by handlers for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellPainting>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPrePaint>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPostPaint> events of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control.
trans-unit.target: Essa enumeração é usada pelo protegido <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Paint%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> método e por manipuladores para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellPainting>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPrePaint>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPostPaint> eventos do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> controle.

trans-unit.source: The following code example illustrates the use of this type.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir ilustra o uso desse tipo.

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Customize the Appearance of Rows in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-rows-in-the-datagrid.md).
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo é parte de um exemplo maior disponível em [como: personalizar a aparência de linhas no controle de DataGridView dos Windows Forms](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-rows-in-the-datagrid.md).

trans-unit.source: All parts of the cell should be painted.
trans-unit.target: Todas as partes da célula devem ser pintadas.

trans-unit.source: The background of the cell should be painted.
trans-unit.target: A tela de fundo da célula deve ser pintada.

trans-unit.source: The border of the cell should be painted.
trans-unit.target: A borda da célula deve ser pintada.

trans-unit.source: The background of the cell content should be painted.
trans-unit.target: A tela de fundo do conteúdo da célula deve ser pintada.

trans-unit.source: The foreground of the cell content should be painted.
trans-unit.target: O primeiro plano do conteúdo da célula deve ser pintado.

trans-unit.source: The cell error icon should be painted.
trans-unit.target: O ícone de erro de célula deve ser pintado.

trans-unit.source: The focus rectangle should be painted around the cell.
trans-unit.target: O retângulo de foco deve ser pintado em torno da célula.

trans-unit.source: The background of the cell should be painted when the cell is selected.
trans-unit.target: A tela de fundo da célula deve ser pintada quando a célula é selecionada.
